segments.advisor_message: Hey there! So, let’s chat about your assets. Do you, um, have anything special in terms of, like, art or collectibles that you own? A car or something maybe? Just trying to get a feel for what you’ve got.
segments.client_message: Oh yeah, I've got this, like, classic car! It's a 1967 Mustang. I bought it a while ago, uh, for about twenty grand, I think. It's super cool!

segments.advisor_message: Nice! A Mustang, huh? That’s awesome! What do you think it’s worth now? Like, did you ever get an estimate on its current value?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I had someone look at it recently and they said it's around, uh, thirty-five thousand now. I mean, it’s in pretty good shape, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Wow, that’s a great increase! Any other details, like, um, any work done on it or just how you feel about it?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I’d say it's been well taken care of! Just a few minor repairs, but, oh, I also keep all the service records. Its, uh, really got this, like, sentimental value for me too!
